data.title: Frey Residence Hall
data.meta_description: Learn more about Frey Residence Hall, including detailed information about room sizes, furnishings and other great amenities.
data.text:
There are two pods per floor and each pod has multiple clusters of double rooms and bathrooms. A cluster consists of 2-4 double bedrooms that share 1-2 bathrooms plus a small storage closet; each cluster feeds into a large shared space of the pod. This shared space has a lounge/living room area with soft seating, tables and chairs, and kitchen area for use by all residents of the pod. The building is co-ed and single gender by suite. A microwave/refrigerator combo unit is provided in each room.

Numerous common areas include: game room, print station, and community lounge. Shared living rooms with kitchens and food lockers are in each pod, and study rooms are located on each floor. Laundry is also located on each floor.

Rooms are 11 feet, 5 inches side-to-side, and 15 feet, 9 inches from door-to-window. Each closet (one per student) is 4 feet wide by 3 feet deep.

Provided in each room, one for each student: Lofted extra-long twin bed and mattress, table desk, pedestal with lockable cabinet to be used with desk, desk chair, and closet with rods and shelves. (NOTE: there is no dresser due to the closet configuration.) Bedrooms are carpeted; bathrooms have a tile floor.
